SEARCH
Package Model

Class Reservation

java.lang.Object
Model.Reservation
public class Reservation extends Object

The Reservation class represents a reservation made by a guest for a specific room in a hotel. It includes guest information, check-in and check-out dates, room details, reservation ID, and pricing information.

Version:
4.4
Author:
Jusper Angelo Cesar

  • Method Details

    • getTotalPrice

      public double getTotalPrice()
      Retrieves the total price for the reservation based on the number of nights stayed and the room's price per night.
      Returns:
      The total price for the reservation.

    • getDuration

      public int getDuration()
      Calculates and returns the duration of the reservation in days.
      Returns:
      The number of days between the check-in day and the check-out day.

    • getDiscount

      public String getDiscount()
      Retrieves the discount code applied to the reservation.
      Returns:
      The discount code as a string.

    • getReservationID

      public String getReservationID()
      Retrieves the reservation ID, which is a unique identifier for this reservation.
      Returns:
      The reservation ID.

    • getGuestName

      public String getGuestName()
      Gets the name of the guest associated with this reservation.
      Returns:
      the guest's name.

    • getCheckIn

      public int getCheckIn()
      Gets the check-in day for this reservation.
      Returns:
      the check-in day as an integer.

    • getCheckOut

      public int getCheckOut()
      Gets the check-out day for this reservation.
      Returns:
      the check-out day as an integer.

    • getRoom

      public Room getRoom()
      Gets the room associated with this reservation.
      Returns:
      the Room object for this reservation.

    • getRoomName

      public String getRoomName()
      Gets the name of the room associated with this reservation.
      Returns:
      the room name as a string.

    • getPriceForDay

      public double getPriceForDay(int checkIn)
      Retrieves the price for a specific day of the reservation.
      Parameters:
      checkIn - The check-in day for which to retrieve the price.
      Returns:
      The price for the specified day.

    • getBreakdown

      public double[] getBreakdown()
      Retrieves the detailed breakdown of prices for each day of the reservation.
      Returns:
      An array of doubles representing the price for each day of the reservation.

    • recalculatePrice

      public void recalculatePrice(double[] priceMods)
      Recalculates the total price of the reservation based on the provided price modifiers and any applicable discount code. Updates the daily prices and the total price accordingly.
      Parameters:
      priceMods - An array of price modifiers to adjust the base rate for each day.
